title: From Lab to Product: shipping small bets
content:
Turning insights into features is a team sport. I like small, measurable bets shipped quickly.

- Define success upfront
- Instrument everything
- Iterate with users

title: Notes on Speech Enhancement Models
content: Quick notes comparing GRU, LSTM, and CRN approaches for speech enhancement on VoiceBank‑DEMAND. Metrics: PESQ, STOI. Preprocessing matters a lot.
